cloudyPixelPercentage.title: Cloud pixel percentage
cloudyPixelPercentage.description: The percentage of the pixel data that is clouds.

dataCoveragePercentage.title: Data coverage percentage
dataCoveragePercentage.description: The percentage of the tile that is valid data.

path.title: Path
path.description: The path at which the tile is available.

tileDataGeometry.title: Tile data geometry
tileDataGeometry.description: The outline of the data contained within the tile.

tileGeometry.title: Tile geometry
tileGeometry.description: The geometry associated with the outline of the tile.

tileOrigin.title: Tile origin
tileOrigin.description: The original coordinate of the tile.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp associated with the tile (typically the start of the data).

utmZone.title: UTM Zone
utmZone.description: The UTM zone of the data.
